details.msg: [LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Unnecessary complexity with separate category classification node and structured output models when simple LLM-based categorization would suffice', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Import statement changed from 'from memory_agent import prompts' to 'from . import prompts' which may cause import issues", severity='minor'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Added unnecessary InMemorySaver checkpointer import and usage when not required for basic interrupt functionality', severity='minor')]

[LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='llm = init_chat_model() missing required model parameter causing positional argument error', severity='critical'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='context=utils.split_model_and_provider(model) parameter should be removed from LLM calls as it causes runtime errors', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='upsert_memory function expects MemoryCategory enum but LangChain passes strings, causing type mismatch errors', severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='classify_message_categories uses only system message for Anthropic API which requires at least one user message', severity='major')]
